fact_check_explanation_title: Factcheck: Measuring low pay isn't the same as measuring poverty
fact_check_explanation_summary: Definitions are important. While the workers in a report from the Resolution Foundation may be "stuck" in a low-paying job, this doesn't mean that they are in poverty.
